basic.description: This course is a fifteen hour per week practicum in intake, assessment, and therapy, including direct contact with clients who have severe psychopathology, supervision, and staffing in the on-campus Psychology Clinic. May be repeated to a maximum of twenty-four (24) semester hours. A maximum of six (6) credits may be taken in the same semester.
basic.subject: CLP
basic.title: Psychology Clinic Advanced Practicum
